bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of liu 瘤 , tumor, and you 疣 , wart. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry cao zhi zhu 草蜘 蛛：瘤疣：用稻上花蜘蛛十餘，安桃枝上，待絲垂下，取東邊者捻為綫 系之。七日一換，自消落也 , “For tumorous warts : Take at least ten spiders from the blossoms of paddy rice and place them on peach twigs. Wait until they have created threads that hang down. Take those on the eastern side and twist them to strings and wind them around the [tumor or wart]. Change after seven days. They will dissolve and fall off by themselves”.
